00035 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00036 // CONSTRUCTORS, DESTRUCTOR, ASSIGNMENT
00037 
00038 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00039 template<class StaticT, class DynamicT>
00040     ParameterLib<StaticT, DynamicT>
00041     ::ParameterLib()
00042 {
00043     // nothing
00044 }
00045 
00046 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00047 template<class StaticT, class DynamicT>
00048     ParameterLib<StaticT, DynamicT>
00049     ::ParameterLib(const ParameterLib<StaticT, DynamicT>& pl)
00050 {
00051         // copy member variables
00052         staticParams_ = pl.staticParams_;
00053         
00054         // and copy over the dynamic variables
00055         hash_map<int , DynamicVariable*>::const_iterator it = pl.dynamicParams_.begin();
00056         
00057         while (it != pl.dynamicParams_.end())
00058         {
00059             if ((*it).second != 0) // beware null pointers
00060             {
00061                 // make a new copy of the DynamicVariable for *this* ParameterLib
00062                 dynamicParams_[(*it).first] = (*it).second->clone();
00063             }
00064             
00065             it++;
00066         }
00067 }
00068 
00069 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00070 template<class StaticT, class DynamicT>
00071     ParameterLib<StaticT, DynamicT>&
00072     ParameterLib<StaticT, DynamicT>
00073     ::operator=(const ParameterLib<StaticT, DynamicT>& pl)
00074 {
00075     if (this != &pl) // beware self assignment
00076     {
00077         // copy member variables
00078         staticParams_ = pl.staticParams_;
00079 
00080         // delete dynamic memory:
00081         hash_map<int , DynamicVariable*>::const_iterator it = dynamicParams_.begin();
00082         while(it != dynamicParams_.end())
00083         {
00084             // (it) is a pair<DynamicT, DynamicVariable*>
00085             if ((*it).second != 0) // beware null pointers
00086             {
00087                 // delete the dynamic memory
00088                 delete (*it).second;
00089                 // NOTE: pointer still says arround, map is cleared later
00090             }
00091             it++;
00092         }
00093         dynamicParams_.clear();
00094 
00095         // copy over dynamic variables
00096         it = pl.dynamicParams_.begin();
00097         while (it != pl.dynamicParams_.end())
00098         {
00099             if ((*it).second != 0) // beware null pointers
00100             {
00101                 // make a new copy of the DynamicVariable for *this* ParameterLib
00102                 dynamicParams_[(*it).first] = (*it).second->clone();
00103             }
00104 
00105             it++;
00106         }
00107 
00108     }
00109 
00110     return *this;
00111 }
00112 
00113 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00114 template<class StaticT, class DynamicT>
00115     ParameterLib<StaticT, DynamicT>
00116     ::~ParameterLib()
00117 {
00118 
00119     // delete dynamic memory:
00120     hash_map<int , DynamicVariable*>::iterator it = dynamicParams_.begin();
00121     
00122     while(it != dynamicParams_.end())
00123     {
00124         // (it) is a pair<DynamicT, DynamicVariable*>
00125         if ((*it).second != 0) // beware null pointers
00126         {
00127             // delete the dynamic memory
00128             delete (*it).second;
00129             // NOTE: pointer still says arround, map is cleared later
00130         }
00131         it++;
00132     }
00133     
00134     dynamicParams_.clear();
00135 }

00138 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00139 // PARAMETER ACCESS
00140 
00141 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00142 // DYNAMIC VARIABLES
00143 
00144 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00145 template<class StaticT, class DynamicT>
00146     void
00147     ParameterLib<StaticT, DynamicT>
00148     ::setParam(DynamicT p, DynamicVariable& v)
00149 {
00150     // is there an entry at this position already?
00151     hash_map<int , DynamicVariable*>::iterator it;
00152     it = dynamicParams_.find(p);
00153     if (it != dynamicParams_.end())
00154     {
00155         // delete the entry
00156         delete (*it).second;
00157     }
00158 
00159     // store the new entry
00160     // make a copy of the passed-in dynamic parameter
00161     dynamicParams_[p] = v.clone();
00162 }
00163 
00164 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00165 template<class StaticT, class DynamicT>
00166     void
00167     ParameterLib<StaticT, DynamicT>
00168     ::setParam(DynamicT p, m_value_type v)
00169 {
00170     Constant c(v);
00171     setParam(p,c);
00172 }
00173 
00174 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00175 template<class StaticT, class DynamicT>
00176     DynamicVariable&
00177     ParameterLib<StaticT, DynamicT>
00178     ::getParam(DynamicT p)
00179 {
00180     // is there an entry at this position already?
00181     hash_map<int , DynamicVariable*>::iterator it;
00182     it = dynamicParams_.find(p);
00183     if (it != dynamicParams_.end())
00184     {
00185         // simply return the entry
00186         return *((*it).second);
00187     }
00188     else
00189     {
00190         // set the entry to zero, and return the value
00191         dynamicParams_[p] = new Constant(0.0);
00192         return *(dynamicParams_[p]);
00193     }
00194 }

00215 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00216 // STATIC VARIABLES
00217 
00218 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00219 template<class StaticT, class DynamicT>
00220     void
00221     ParameterLib<StaticT, DynamicT>
00222     ::setParam(StaticT p, m_value_type v)
00223 {
00224     staticParams_[p] = v;
00225 }
00226 
00227 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00228 template<class StaticT, class DynamicT>
00229     m_value_type
00230     ParameterLib<StaticT, DynamicT>
00231     ::getParam(StaticT p)
00232 {
00233     // is there an entry at this position already?
00234     hash_map<int , m_value_type>::iterator it;
00235     it = staticParams_.find(p);
00236     if (it != staticParams_.end())
00237     {
00238         // return the entry
00239         return (*it).second;
00240     }
00241     else
00242     {
00243         // set the entry to 0.0, and return 0.0;
00244         staticParams_[p] = 0.0;
00245         return 0.0;
00246     }
00247 }
